mapper.insert: insert into V_HIS_OPERATION_DETAIL (OPERATION_DETAIL_ID, OPERATION_MAIN_ID, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, OUTPATIENT_NO, PATIENT_SOURCE, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, FIRST_ASSISTANT_ID, FIRST_ASSISTANT, SECOND_ASSISTANT_ID, SECOND_ASSISTANT, THIRD_ASSISTANT_ID, THIRD_ASSISTANT, ANESTHESIA_METHODS, ANESTHESIA_DOSAGE, ANESTHETIST_ID, ANESTHETIST, INSTRUMENT_NURSE_ID, INSTRUMENT_NURSE, PREOPERATIVE_DIAGNOSIS, INTRAOPERATIVE_DIAGNOSIS, POSTOPERATIVE_DIAGNOSIS, OPERATION_PROCEDURE) values (#{operationDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationMainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inhospitalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outpatientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstAssistantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstAssistant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondAssistantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondAssistant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdAssistantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdAssistant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anesthesiaMethods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anesthesiaDosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anesthetist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instrumentNurseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instrumentNurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preoperativeDiagnosis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{intraoperativeDiagnosis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{postoperativeDiagnosis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{operationProcedure,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update V_HIS_OPERATION_DETAIL set OPERATION_MAIN_ID = #{operationMainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_NO = #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INHOSPITAL_NO = #{inhospitalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUTPATIENT_NO = #{outpatientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATIENT_SOURCE = #{patientSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_ASSISTANT_ID = #{firstAssistantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_ASSISTANT = #{firstAssistant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECOND_ASSISTANT_ID = #{secondAssistantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECOND_ASSISTANT = #{secondAssistant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THIRD_ASSISTANT_ID = #{thirdAssistantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THIRD_ASSISTANT = #{thirdAssistant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANESTHESIA_METHODS = #{anesthesiaMethods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANESTHESIA_DOSAGE = #{anesthesiaDosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANESTHETIST_ID = #{anesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANESTHETIST = #{anesthetist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSTRUMENT_NURSE_ID = #{instrumentNurseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSTRUMENT_NURSE = #{instrumentNurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREOPERATIVE_DIAGNOSIS = #{preoperativeDiagnosis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, INTRAOPERATIVE_DIAGNOSIS = #{intraoperativeDiagnosis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, POSTOPERATIVE_DIAGNOSIS = #{postoperativeDiagnosis,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, OPERATION_PROCEDURE = #{operationProcedure,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where OPERATION_DETAIL_ID = #{operationDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select OPERATION_DETAIL_ID, OPERATION_MAIN_ID, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, OUTPATIENT_NO, PATIENT_SOURCE, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, FIRST_ASSISTANT_ID, FIRST_ASSISTANT, SECOND_ASSISTANT_ID, SECOND_ASSISTANT, THIRD_ASSISTANT_ID, THIRD_ASSISTANT, ANESTHESIA_METHODS, ANESTHESIA_DOSAGE, ANESTHETIST_ID, ANESTHETIST, INSTRUMENT_NURSE_ID, INSTRUMENT_NURSE, PREOPERATIVE_DIAGNOSIS, INTRAOPERATIVE_DIAGNOSIS, POSTOPERATIVE_DIAGNOSIS, OPERATION_PROCEDURE from V_HIS_OPERATION_DETAIL where OPERATION_DETAIL_ID = #{operationDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select OPERATION_DETAIL_ID, OPERATION_MAIN_ID, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, OUTPATIENT_NO, PATIENT_SOURCE, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, FIRST_ASSISTANT_ID, FIRST_ASSISTANT, SECOND_ASSISTANT_ID, SECOND_ASSISTANT, THIRD_ASSISTANT_ID, THIRD_ASSISTANT, ANESTHESIA_METHODS, ANESTHESIA_DOSAGE, ANESTHETIST_ID, ANESTHETIST, INSTRUMENT_NURSE_ID, INSTRUMENT_NURSE, PREOPERATIVE_DIAGNOSIS, INTRAOPERATIVE_DIAGNOSIS, POSTOPERATIVE_DIAGNOSIS, OPERATION_PROCEDURE from V_HIS_OPERATION_DETAIL
